D1.name: UCI Concrete
D1.notes: Calibrated via Bolomey optimization. MAE ~8.9 MPa.

D2.name: NDT Synthetic
D2.notes: Dataset has different cement grade. Calibrated K=16.

D3.name: Sonay Dataset
D3.notes: Similar to D2. Achieved MAE ~5.3 MPa.

D4.name: RH (Research)
D4.notes: Higher cement efficiency. MAE ~18.4 (high variance dataset).
